results.title: Atenolol blunts blood pressure increase during dynamic resistance exercise in hypertensives.
results.text_hl: AIMS: This study was conducted to determine whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was able to decrease BP level and mitigate @<m>DISEASE_Symptom_Flare_Up</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067251 @@@BP increase@@@ during dynamic resistance exercise performed at three different intensities in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensives@@@.

citations.NLM: Gomides RS, Costa LA, Souza DR, Queiroz AC, Fernandes JR, Ortega KC, Junior DM, Tinucci T, Forjaz CL. Atenolol blunts blood pressure increase during dynamic resistance exercise in hypertensives. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 2010 Nov;70(5):664-73. PMID: 21039760
citations.BibTeX: @article{21039760, title={Atenolol blunts blood pressure increase during dynamic resistance exercise in hypertensives.}, author={Gomides RS and Costa LA and Souza DR and Queiroz AC and Fernandes JR and Ortega KC and Junior DM and Tinucci T and Forjaz CL}, journal={Br J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={70}, number={5}, pages={664-73}}

results.title: Hypotensive and cardio-chronotropic constituents of Tinospora crispa and mechanisms of action on the cardiovascular system in anesthetized rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ inhibited the @<m>DISEASE_Symptom_Flare_Up</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067251 @@@increase@@@ in HR at a small dosage of @CHEMICAL_higenamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C012348 @@@higenamine@@@ but potentiated it at a higher dosage.

citations.NLM: Praman S, Mulvany MJ, Williams DE, Andersen RJ, Jansakul C. Hypotensive and cardio-chronotropic constituents of Tinospora crispa and mechanisms of action on the cardiovascular system in anesthetized rats. J Ethnopharmacol. 2012 Mar 6;140(1):166-78. PMID: 22265931
citations.BibTeX: @article{22265931, title={Hypotensive and cardio-chronotropic constituents of Tinospora crispa and mechanisms of action on the cardiovascular system in anesthetized rats.}, author={Praman S and Mulvany MJ and Williams DE and Andersen RJ and Jansakul C}, journal={J Ethnopharmacol}, volume={140}, number={1}, pages={166-78}}
